scripts.db:mongo: cd mongo && docker compose -f docker-compose.mongo.yml up -d
scripts.db:mysql: cd mysql && docker compose -f docker-compose.mysql.yml up -d
scripts.db:elasticsearch: cd elasticsearch && docker compose -f docker-compose.elasticsearch.yml up -d
scripts.db:postgresql: cd postgresql && docker compose -f docker-compose.postgresql.yml up -d
scripts.db:stop: docker compose -f mongo/docker-compose.mongo.yml down && docker compose -f mysql/docker-compose.mysql.yml down && docker compose -f elasticsearch/docker-compose.elasticsearch.yml down && docker compose -f postgresql/docker-compose.postgresql.yml down
